content:
To boldly go....we have decided to open up our FHIR .NET Committers meetings to everyone interested in contributing to the FHIR .NET API!

The next one is on November 26th, 10:00-11:00 UTC (11:00-12:00 CET, 05:00-06:00 EST, 21:00-22:00 AEDT)
Join on: https://zoom.us/j/573322038

Notes of the last meeting and agenda for the next meeting can be found here: https://github.com/ewoutkramer/fhir-net-api/wiki
Here are the minutes of this morning's meeting: https://github.com/ewoutkramer/fhir-net-api/wiki/20181126-Community-Meeting-Minutes
Just realized the meeting is 5 ET am, not 5 ET pm.
It's a good time for me in Australia (and the only call I have that is pleasant)
